document_data.caption: A map showing the Bitter Well Oasis near the Dragonwall.
document_data.name: Bitter Well Oasis
document_data.mainbody: '''Bitter Well Oasis''' was a small resting stop located in the southern regions of the [[Quoya Desert]] within the [[Hordelands]].
document_data.Description:
Set on a plateau, this nearly abandoned oasis was small and pitiful. Only three buildings, mostly buried by [[sand]], were located at the site, and two of them were abandoned.

Water from the well tasted bitter and salty.

It was one of several stops along the [[Bitter Well Caravan Route]] before the route was abandoned.
document_data.Inhabitants: [[Ma Chung-ying]] was the only permanent resident of Bitter Well Oasis around [[1359 DR]]. He stayed to keep the well clear of sand, and to report on the few actions of the nomad tribes to [[Shou Lung]], in exchange for a stipend of food and wine.
